messages.content: Sirius! How are you? It feels like ages since we've chatted.
Harry! So good to hear from you. I'm doing well, laying low and staying out of trouble. How's school?
School's going pretty well, though Potions is still awful as usual. Quidditch has been keeping me busy!
Ah yes, the dreaded Potions. Some things never change, eh? Glad to hear Quidditch is going well though. Gryffindor better win the Cup this year!
We're certainly going to try! Our team looks strong this season. I just hope I can catch the Snitch in time for us to win the close games.
You've got this, Harry! You're a brilliant Seeker, just focus on the Snitch and let the rest of the team worry about scoring goals.
Thanks, Sirius! I'll do my best. Our first match against Slytherin is coming up soon. I'm trying not to think about how badly Malfoy wants to beat us!
Ugh, Malfoy. Don't let him get in your head! You have way more talent than that bloke. Just tune out the trash talk and catch that Snitch!
You're right, I can't let Malfoy distract me. Easier said than done sometimes though! I'll be sure to focus extra hard during the Slytherin match.
That's the spirit! Let me know how the match goes. I expect a full play-by-play. In the meantime, give my best to Ron and Hermione!
Will do! I'm sure they'll be happy to hear from you. Talk soon, Sirius!
Sirius! We beat Slytherin in the first Quidditch match! I managed to grab the Snitch right before Malfoy could get it. You should've seen his face!
Fantastic job, Harry! So pleased to hear you trounced Slytherin and Malfoy. Bet that felt brilliant. Keep this up and you'll have the Quidditch Cup for sure!
Thanks! It felt amazing to beat them. The after party in the common room was brilliant too. But it's still early, lots more matches to go.
Very true, can't get complacent. But do enjoy the victory! Winning the first match is big. Keep working hard at practice and you'll be unstoppable.
You're right, one match at a time. I'm already focusing on our next game against Ravenclaw. Their Seeker Cho Chang is really talented.
Ah yes, Cho's a strong player. But you have the faster broom and more experience. Stick to your strengths and you'll do brilliantly.
Thanks Sirius, I appreciate the vote of confidence! I'll be sure to practice my dives and rolls to stay sharp.
Excellent idea. Those maneuvers will give you an edge. Let me know if you need any more Quidditch pointers!
Will do! Your tips are really helpful. Talk to you soon!
Hey Sirius, how's your week going? I just finished up classes for the day.
Harry! My week's been alright, laying low as usual. Glad classes are done for the day, get some rest! Anything fun coming up?
Not much, just Quidditch practice and homework per usual. We've got a Hogsmeade visit coming up though which should be nice!
Excellent! Hogsmeade weekends were always a highlight for me. Make sure to stock up on sweets from Honeydukes. I expect a full report!
You got it! I'll be sure to bring back loads of chocolate frogs and sugar quills. And I'll give you all the highlights from the visit.
Brilliant! Now I'm getting nostalgic thinking about Honeydukes. Sneak me some treacle fudge if you can!
Consider it done! I'll see what I can smuggle out under my invisibility cloak.
Love it! You're an old pro with that cloak now eh? Have fun but stay out of too much trouble!
Will do! The cloak definitely comes in handy sometimes. I'll be on my best behavior though, don't worry.
Glad to hear it! Enjoy yourself and don't study too hard. You've earned some fun time.
Thanks Sirius! I'm looking forward to a bit of a break. Talk to you soon!
Happy Halloween, Sirius! Hope you're having a spooky one.
Happy Halloween, Harry! Hard to be too spooky in hiding, but I'm making do. How are the Hogwarts celebrations?
They're brilliant as always! Hagrid's pumpkins are massive. And the Halloween feast is sure to be amazing later.
That sounds fantastic! Hogwarts feasts were always a highlight. Enjoy all the delicious food and sweets today!
I definitely will! I'll be sure to have some treacle tart in your honor.
Much appreciated! Treacle tart holds a special place in my heart. Maybe sneak me some if you can?
Consider it done! I'll see if I can wrap up a slice or two for you.
You're the best! Enjoy all the Halloween fun today, you deserve it.
Thanks, Sirius! Happy Halloween to you too. Talk soon!
Hi Sirius! How's your week been? Mine's been pretty busy with classes and Quidditch.
Hey Harry! My week's been uneventful as usual out here. Glad you're keeping busy with school and Quidditch!
Yeah, it's nice to have things to focus on, though homework can be dull. Quidditch is going well at least!
Good to hear Quidditch is still a bright spot! Homework was always a bore. Except when Remus helped us out.
Too right, I definitely appreciate the help from Hermione on essays. Though Potions homework is rough no matter what.
Ugh, Potions homework was The Worst. Poor Hermione has her work cut out for her there. Keep your spirits up!
So true, she tries her best but can only do so much. I'm powering through though! Any plans for the weekend?
Just staying out of sight as usual. The weekend is more of the same for me. You should enjoy yourself though!
Nothing too exciting here either, but a relaxing weekend does sound nice. Don't have too much fun without me!
I'll try to rein it in! Rest up this weekend, you deserve a break.
Thanks Sirius! Talk to you soon.
Happy Christmas Eve, Sirius! Sending you holiday cheer.
Happy Christmas Eve, Harry! Hard to get too festive in my current situation, but I appreciate the cheer!
I know it's not ideal, but I hope you can still enjoy the season a bit. Any plans for tomorrow?
Just keeping a low profile as usual. But Christmas is always special, I'll do something nice for myself! What about you?
Staying at Hogwarts this year, so Christmas dinner in the Great Hall! And hopefully some wizard chess by the fire.
That sounds cozy! Hogwarts is so magical at Christmas. Make sure to enjoy some treacle tart for me!
I definitely will! Might even sneak some out for you if I can manage it.
You're too kind! Enjoy the feast and have a wonderful Christmas, Harry.
Thanks, Sirius! Merry Christmas to you too.
Happy New Year, Sirius! Wishing you an amazing 2022.
Happy New Year, Harry! Hard to believe it's 2022 already. Here's to a safe and peaceful year for us all.
Cheers to that! Do you have any goals or plans for the new year?
Mostly just staying free and alive! Maybe I'll take up a new hobby in my spare time. What about you?
Good goals! I'd like to improve at Potions and win the Quidditch Cup. But staying out of mortal peril is also priority.
Excellent priorities! I have faith you can master Potions and snag that Quidditch Cup. But do be careful!
I'll do my best! Hopefully this year will be relatively calm and danger-free.
Fingers crossed! You're due for an uneventful year. Stay safe and have some fun too!
Thanks, Sirius! Wishing you a great 2022 as well.
Hi Sirius, how's 2022 treating you so far? The first week back at Hogwarts has been busy.
Hey Harry! 2022 is off to a decent start for me, can't complain. Glad you're back into the swing of things at Hogwarts!
Yeah, it's nice to be back with my friends and Quidditch. Classes aren't too bad yet either.
Cherish that time with your friends! And keep up the Quidditch dominance. Classes will get tougher but you've got this.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm trying to stay on top of homework and revising. How's your winter going?
No problem, you're a smart kid. My winter is cold but could be worse. At least I can transform into a dog when I need warmth!
Good point, I bet the fur helps! Hogwarts is chilly too, but the fireplaces help. Let me know if you need any supplies!
Appreciate the offer! I'm getting by alright for now. Stay cozy up there, winter is almost halfway done.
Will do! Looking forward to warmer days ahead.
